ygData.subject: Re: Starting Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the advice. I m now using a dagger of dropping that i bought from a Barb rogue (I could speak to him in Thieves Cant, or i would have missed this
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the advice. I'm now using a dagger of
dropping that i bought from a Barb rogue (I could speak to
him in Thieves Cant, or i would have missed this
great deal). With that, I could hunt wisps, and then
snuck my way to NK to turn in GLS at the gypsie camp--
ended up netting me about 50pp!!!! <br><br>So now I'm
lvl 14 with dual wield maxxed out, but still working
on max for Backstab. Oh, btw-- pickpocket is maxxed
out too-- /grin.<br><br>I brought a regular axe,
which is pretty decent-- 1HS 6/31. I'd like the gnoll
hide just for the delay-- to keep up my 1HS, dual
wield, and double attack when i get it at 16. I also use
throwing knives-- I'v had a couple of 17dmg crits, and
just think it's great for rollplaying. "Rumble eyes
you coldly as he picks his teeth with a razor sharp
knife."<br><br>As far as armor-- now that i have cash, i'm looking
for some banded. Bought a gorget for 4pp (5ac, so I
thought that was a good deal). The rest is leather and
patchwork, as it's tough to find stuff at my level on this
new server. What i did do though is get that Freeport
Militia Tunic-- 9AC +3Dex-- which is pretty nice. It's
red and i get inspected a lot-- plus I'm amiable with
the militia, who seem follow my life tenents.
<br><br>That BP from Kaladim sounds good, but I don't much
like dwarves, and stay as far away from gnomes as
possible-- they give us short races a bad name, plus what's
the deal with thier lack of hair???<br><br>Dragoon
Dirk is next on my list. I hear that D'Vinn's evil
cousin D'ornn (or something like that) hangs out at a
dervish camp in NRo and carries a Dirk as well. I don't
like sand much, but i'm planning on making a trip
there soon anyway to see if a can trick some large
burly types into helping me get it!<br><br>The life of
a rogue is the way for me. EQ is all new now!!
<br><br>Rumble<br>Good fer nuthin pickpocket of the 14th
station<br>Former dishwasher at Fool's Gold<br>Honorary Member of
the Freeport Militia<br>FV
